Another-The Series

Series Information

Technical:

Synopsis:26 years ago, in a third-year classroom of a middle school, there was a student named Misaki. As an honors student who was also good at sports, she was popular with her classmates. When she suddenly died, her classmates decided to carry on as if she was still alive until graduation. Then, in the spring of 1998, a boy named Sakakibara Kouichi transfers to the class, and he grows suspicious of the fearful atmosphere in that classroom. In particular, there is a beautiful, aloof girl named Mei Misaki who wears an eyepatch and is always alone drawing pictures.



Another: The Other-OAV


Year:2012
Episodes:1
Categories:Horror, Novel, School Life, Seinen, Mystery
Video:1280x720-h264-2071kb/s
Audio:2.0 Stereo Vorbis Japanese Audio-186 kBit/s
Subtitles:English subtitles


Synopsis: This OAV is a prequel to the events that led to the main characters actions in the series.



Notes: This reminds me of Fatal Frame in a way, has a dark atmosphere and is not in your face morbid or horror, more along the lines of has things that are out of place, things not meant to be there type horror. I highly recommend this to any fan of anime
